text: Louisa Julie Mavaega (born 15 March 1998) is an American Samoan women's footballer who plays as a forward for the Midland Warriors. ==Career== Mavaega made her international debut for American Samoa on 30 August 2018, coming on as a substitute in the 69th minute for Ava Mana'o in the 2018 OFC Women's Nations Cup qualification match against Fiji. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|American Samoa |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2018||1||0 |- !Total!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Profile at oceaniafootball.com Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Pago Pago Category:American Samoan women's footballers Category:American Samoa women's international footballers Category:Women's association football forwards Category:Grace University alumni Category:Midland University alumni
title: Louisa Mavaega
